message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the product's value and rarity, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $15000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to sell it for $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $18000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the time I've invested in it.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $16500.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell it for $16500. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $17500. This is as low as I can go, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the negotiations we've had, I would like to counteroffer at $17000.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $17200. This is as low as I can go, and I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to counteroffer at $16800.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $16900. This is as low as I can go, and I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.
Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to counteroffer at $16700.
